game.name: The Farmer Was Replaced
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 드론을 프로그래밍하고 최적화하여 농장을 자동화하고 드론의 작업을 지켜보세요. 자원을 모아 더 나은 기술을 잠금 해제하고 세계에서 가장 효율적인 농부가 되어보세요. 문제 해결 능력과 코딩 기술을 향상시키세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Program and optimize a drone to automate a farm and watch it do the work for you. Collect resources to unlock better technology and become the most efficient farmer in the world. Improve your problem solving and coding skills.

reviewHighlights.text: I am still going to put this as a recommend, even with my own personal gripes. The game has a solid, interesting premise and is a nice introduction to...
A great programming game that works both as a way to learn Python and as a fun challenge for experienced developers. The in-game documentation is thor...
